OOC: Okay Zardus, i'll take your advice, but i had no choice!  I dont want my 
characters to be massacred, so i try to take out all the opposition with as 
much firepower within the rules.

:::Torca/Orion/Ratchet:::

::Torca gets hit by some of the shots and fires 25 nails at Astral::
~~~~~
::The darts take their toll on Orion and he walked up against the wall of the 
CF and fell asleep::
~~~~~
::Ratchet dodges the missle, but gets hit by all of Fenox's shots.  He fired 
15 shots from one gun and one tusk missle at Perndabot, and 15 shots from his 
other gun and 1 tusk missle at Fenox::

--part1_c9.b850a7a.27711bb4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
